thread.title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger reveals latest on his Arsenal future and insists he is "clear" on his decision
thread.title_full: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger reveals latest on his Arsenal future and insists he is "clear" on his decision

author: Alex Smith
title: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger reveals latest on his Arsenal future and insists he is "clear" on his decision
text:
Sport Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger reveals latest on his Gunners future and insists he is "clear" on his decision The Gunners boss is out of contract in the summer but fans are desperate for the Frenchman to move on after 22 years Share Wenger is still yet to sign a new deal, with fans and Stan Kroenke awaiting a decision (Photo: AFP/Arsenal FC/Getty Images) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
Arsene Wenger has revealed he has a "clean mind" over his Arsenal future - but has still not signed a new deal. 
Wenger, who is out of contract at the end of this campaign, is reportedly set to make a decision over his future next week if he beats Manchester City on Sunday - with the Frenchman expected to sign a new two year deal. 
When asked whether when he would announce his future, he said: "Not today. But I am very clear in my mind. 
"Do I stay two more years? My commitment will be the same. Wenger could miss out on the top four this season (Photo: REUTERS) Wenger has been at the Gunners since 1996 (Photo: PA) Arsene Wenger signs autographs before the match (Photo: Getty) 
"It does not influence my attitude. I’ve always been clear in my mind. 
"It’s a subject that is not sorted completely." 
The former Monaco gaffer has lead the Gunners to three Premier League titles and six FA Cups - but has not lifted the league crown for 13 years to disappoint fans. Gunners fans and Wenger have not seen eye to eye this season (Photo: Reuters / Stefan Wermuth) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
